name: redmine-jenkins-build-status
body:
A plugin for [Redmine](http://www.redmine.org/). ![redmine-jenkins-build-status screenshot](https://github.com/bluefuton/redmine_jenkins_build_status/raw/master/screenshot.jpg) ## Installation Clone into Redmine's vendor/plugins folder. Inside the plugin's config folder, copy jenkins.example.yml to jenkins.yml and add your Jenkins JSON API URL to it. For example: 
production:
  api_url: http://jenkins.example.com/api/json
## Conventions The project identifier used in Jenkins must match the project identifier used in Redmine. ## Credits Author: Chris Rosser
tagline: A simple indicator for Redmine showing whether a project's build is currently passing or failing in Jenkins
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
